sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The DirectFB package provides dfbdump, dfbg, dfbinfo, dfblayer, directfb-config, directfb-csource and libdirectfb libraries.

sect3.title: dfbdump
sect3.para: This is a simple debugging tool for DirectFB that shows a list of surfaces and windows.

sect3.title: dfbg
sect3.para: dfbg is a background configuration tool.

sect3.title: dfblayer
sect3.para: dfblayer is a display layer configuration tool.

sect3.title: directfb-config
sect3.para: directfb-config provides all flags to link static binaries with choosable drivers and other modules built in.

sect3.title: directfb-csource
sect3.para: This is a C code generation utility for DirectFB surfaces.

sect3.title: libdirectfb libraries
sect3.para: They provide hardware graphics acceleration, input device handling and abstraction, integrated windowing system with support for translucent windows and multiple display layers on top of the Linux framebuffer device.
